page.title: 19Yarm Parking
page.content: { Most of Yarm High Street is a controlled parking area and you need a {parking disc}before you can park. A disc is a piece of card with a numbered clock underneath.You turn the clock to the current time and leave it in the car.This means the{Traffic {Warden}can see how long you have stayed.Most people in our survey only stayed for an average of 20 minutes but you can park for{2 hours. This means people can park for shopping and also have time to go and have a look around the shops and get some bits and pieces. Some people have to go and pop out and move their cars so it is easier for them to park behind their shops where there are no restrictions.
